MS: Compare ideal vs non ideal, MS
Analyze the previously given circuit. Which of the following are true about the ideal and non-ideal output values of F? Select all that apply.

column3: The two outputs are identical, but the non-ideal output f arrives 5ns later
Whenever more than 5ns has elapsed since the most recent change in either a or b, the ideal and non-ideal circuits will have the same output.
This circuit can suffer glitches, which persist for no longer than 5ns per single glitch.
This circuit can suffer glitches, which can persist for longer than 5ns per single glitch.
